org.restsql.core.impl
Class SqlResourceImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.restsql.core.impl.SqlResourceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SqlResource
public class SqlResourceImpl
extends Object
implements SqlResource

Represents a SQL Resource, an queryable and updatable database "view". Loads metadata on creation and caches it.

Author:
Mark Sawers

getTables

public Map<String,TableMetaData> getTables()
Description copied from interface: SqlResource
Returns meta data for all tables and columns. Includes parent, parent extensions, child and child extensions, but not the join table.

Specified by:
getTables in interface SqlResource
Returns:
map of table meta data by qualified table name, i.e. database.table
